verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
The composer and conductor of the universe,\
steps before the orchestra of God

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Creation lifts their finely crafted instruments
as all in heaven wildly applaud

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
The season well rehearsed begin with His down beat
and on His cue the sun trumpets the dawn

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
The whirling winds swell in a mighty crescendo
with each commanding sweep of His batton

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
The oceans pound the shore in march to His cadence
the galaxies all revolve in cosmic rhyme

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
The fall of raindrops all in wild syncopation
as lightning strikes and thunder claps in time

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
The symphony of praise conducted by the ancient of days
May each creation great or small lift their
voices one and all in the symphony of praise

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Heaven waits in hushed anticipation
the great I AM then turns to mortal men
A massive chorus robed in spotless garments

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
offers up their song of praise to Him
The glories of God explode in full orchestration
as all creation joins the thundrous refrain

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines: Worthy, Worthy, Worthy is the Lamb that was slain

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
The symphony of praise glory to the Ancient of Days
May each creation great or small lift their voices one and all
in the symphony of praise

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines:
Worthy, Worthy, Worthy is the Lamb that was slain
Worthy, Worthy, Worthy is the Lamb

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
May each creation great or small lift their voices one and all
in the symphony of praise
OF PRAISE!
